name: Column like
tagline: Allows ActiveRecord Model to use like query.
body: # Column Like Column Like allows you to search using like query in ActiveRecord. It is: * LightWeight * Customizable * Available with every model ## Getting started Column Like works with ActiveRecord 3.0 onwards. You can add it to your Gemfile with: ```ruby gem 'column_like' ``` Run the bundle command to install it. After you install Column Like and add it to your Gemfile, you need to run the generator: ```console rails generate column_like:install ``` You should restart your application after installing Column Like. ## Usage ```ruby User.first_name_like('satyam') User.last_name_like('satyam') User.email_like('satyam') ``` ## Bug reports If you discover a problem with Column Like, I would like to know about it. Send an email to satyam.mgs@gmail.com
